text: Michel Issindou (born July 12, 1952) was a member of the National Assembly of France. He represented the Isère's 2nd constituency from 2007 to 2017, as a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Michel Issindou
